snippet.title: TORN VR | Official Worldwide Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Now Available:
PlayStation VR | https://store.playstation.com/en-us/product/UP1032-CUSA09584_00-ASPYRTORNREL0001
Steam | https://store.steampowered.com/app/557520/Torn/
Oculus | https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1981676341851640/

Enter the dark science-fiction mystery of Torn, and unwrap the secrets within an abandoned mansion.

In 1953, on the brink of a major scientific breakthrough, the renowned physicist Dr. Lawrence Talbot vanished. For 64 years, his mansion remained hidden, his laboratory and work all but forgotten... Until now. 

Aspyr Media is proud to introduce Torn, a dark-science fiction mystery inspired by The Twilight Zone and Black Mirror, coming to PSVR, Oculus, and Vive this spring.
